scripts.demo:showcase: pnpm reset && pnpm demo:multichannel && (pnpm webhook:listen:once > /tmp/ruya-webhook.log 2>&1 &) && sleep 1 && pnpm webhook:replay && sleep 1 && cat /tmp/ruya-webhook.log
scripts.judge:test:secure: pnpm reset && pnpm demo:multichannel && (ELEVENLABS_WEBHOOK_SECRET=whsec_judge pnpm webhook:listen:once > /tmp/ruya-webhook-secure.log 2>&1 &) && sleep 1 && ELEVENLABS_WEBHOOK_SECRET=whsec_judge pnpm webhook:replay && sleep 1 && cat /tmp/ruya-webhook-secure.log
